document.full_text: the head of new york's nassau county on wednesday proposed across-the-board budget cuts and layoffs in order to meet $121 million in spending cuts that he said are needed to bring the budget back into balance.
document.title: nassau county, ny, proposed budget includes layoffs
lines_and_colors: the head of new york's nassau county on wednesday proposed across-the-board budget cuts and layoffs in order to meet $121 million in spending cuts that he said are needed to bring the budget back into balance.
